replies.body:
Welcome to the forums!
Here are the rules so you can understand what's cool and what's not when it comes to making, threads and posts.

If you have any questions, feel free to ask!
We'll be more than happy to help you out!

replies.body:
hey! Welcome to the forums :)
You probably know already, but you can check out your own stats from in-game times but clicking on your profile in the top right of the screen!

Also, if you want to make a post on different topics, just click on the categories on the left :)

Welcome again, and enjoy :D

replies.body:
G'day man welcome!
In the future instead of bumping your own post why don't you contribute to someone else's preferably a more recent one?
If you have any questions myself or any other staff member will be ready to help. 
Thanks
